item.title: 美国监管机构称数据中心对电网构成威胁
item.description: 负责监管电网的美国机构罕见地发出警告称，与电网连接的大型数据中心目前是电网可靠性面临的最大近期风险之一。【原文：Big data centers connecting to power grids is now one of the greatest near-term risks to reliability, according to a rare warning by the US agency charged with overseeing the sector.】

item.title: 东非计划增加支出以抵消全球风险和援助削减的影响
item.description: 东非财政部长们将计划支出增加到创纪录的水平，以维持经济增长，减轻地缘政治风险和外国援助削减的影响。【原文：East African finance chiefs increased planned spending to a record to sustain economic growth and mitigate the effects of geopolitical risks and cuts in foreign aid.】

item.title: 美国财政部 30 年期债券拍卖需求强劲
item.description: 30 年期国债拍卖吸引了强劲的需求，这表明 29 万亿美元的市场到目前为止还没有出现长期债券买方全面出击的情况。【原文：An auction of 30-year Treasuries drew solid demand in a sign that the $29 trillion market is so far avoiding an all-out buyers’ strike in long-term bonds.】

item.title: 研究表明，艾芬豪铜矿的洪水是自己造成的
item.description: 根据运营商艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. ）公布的初步调查结果，中断刚果民主共和国一座大型铜矿产出的地震活动似乎是人为造成的。【原文：Seismic activity that disrupted output at a massive copper mine in the Democratic Republic of Congo appears self-induced, according to preliminary findings released by operator Ivanhoe Mines Ltd.】

item.title: AMD 首席执行官预计到 2028 年人工智能处理器市场规模将超过 5000 亿美元
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.首席执行官丽莎-苏（Lisa Su）表示，未来三年人工智能处理器市场的增长速度将超过预期，该公司正试图挑战英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. Chief Executive Officer Lisa Su said the market for AI processors will grow faster than expected over the next three years as her company attempts to challenge Nvidia Corp.’s industry dominance.】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚希望大型矿商在当地提炼和交易 20% 的黄金
item.description: 坦桑尼亚计划强制要求大型矿商在国内提炼和交易至少 20% 的黄金产量，因为这个东非国家希望从金价上涨中获益，并控制更大份额的资源。【原文：Tanzania plans to make it compulsory for large-scale miners to refine and trade at least 20% of their gold output domestically as the East African nation seeks to benefit from a rally in the bullion price and control a larger share of its resources.】

item.title: 阿波罗准备为 Neinor 的 Aedas 竞购提供 7.5 亿欧元贷款
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is poised to provide the bulk of the financing for a potential deal in Spain that could create the nation’s biggest developer.】

item.title: 巴克莱称投资者对 "报复税 "的担忧被过分夸大了
item.description: 巴克莱资本（Barclays Capital）认为，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的税收与支出法案中一项旨在惩罚 "不公平 "税制国家的争议性条款不太可能扰乱美国债券和股票市场。【原文：A controversial provision in President Donald Trump’s tax-and-spending bill aimed at penalizing countries with “unfair” tax regimes is unlikely to disrupt US bond and stock markets, according to Barclays Capital.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行的威尔逊离开债务联合部，转投多伦多多米尼克银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情但无权公开发表言论的人士透露，丹尼尔-威尔逊（Daniel Wilson）将离开加拿大皇家银行的政府债务银团业务部门，加盟多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）。【原文：Daniel Wilson is leaving Royal Bank of Canada’s government debt syndication desk to join Toronto-Dominion Bank, according to people familiar with the matter who are not authorized to speak publicly.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国政府将获得美国钢铁的 "黄金份额
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，在美国钢铁公司被日本新日本制铁公司收购后，美国政府将保留该公司的 "黄金股份"。【原文：President Donald Trump said the US government will retain a “golden share” in United States Steel Corp. after its purchase by Japan’s Nippon Steel Corp.】

item.title: 美国家庭净资产自 2023 年以来首次下降
item.description: 年初，美国家庭资产自 2023 年以来首次出现下降，原因是美国人正在应对由关税引发的股市大跌。【原文：US household worth declined at the start of the year for the first time in since 2023 as Americans contended with a tariff-driven stock market selloff.】

item.title: 特朗普提高汽车关税，废除加州汽油车禁令
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他可能会提高美国汽车关税，以促进国内汽车制造业的发展，此举可能会进一步加剧与贸易伙伴的紧张关系。【原文：President Donald Trump said he may raise US auto tariffs in order to boost domestic auto manufacturing, a move that could further ratchet up tensions with trading partners.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率微跌，30 年期平均利率降至 6.84
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第二周下降。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US fell for a second straight week.】

item.title: 美国寻求在七月前就卢旺达-刚果冲突达成和平协议
item.description: 美国国务院负责非洲事务的一位高级官员表示，美国希望卢旺达和刚果民主共和国在七月前签署和平协议。【原文：The US wants Rwanda and Democratic Republic of Congo to sign a peace deal by July, according to a top State Department official for Africa.】

item.title: 贝森特认为减税法案通过后赤字将在 10 年内下降
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，对于共和党标志性减税法案对赤字的影响有许多不同的评估，他自己的预期是该法案将在十年内减少借贷。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said that there are a number of different assessments of the deficit impact of Republicans’ signature tax-cut bill, and that his own expectation is it will shrink borrowing over a decade.】

item.title: 首席执行官称 GameStop 的未来在于交易卡
item.description: 美国最大的独立视频游戏零售商 GameStop Corp. 首席执行官 Ryan Cohen 周四在公司年度股东大会上表示，公司将重点发展交易卡业务。【原文：GameStop Corp., the largest standalone video-game retailer in the US, will focus on growing its trading card business, Chief Executive Officer Ryan Cohen said at the company’s annual shareholder meeting Thursday.】

item.title: 英国科技部长表示，养老金干预将释放资本
item.description: 技术大臣彼得-凯尔（Peter Kyle）说，伦敦证券交易所资本不足，英国政府计划干预养老基金，迫使它们投资私营公司，这将增加注入经济的资金量。【原文：The London Stock Exchange is under-capitalized and the UK government’s plan to intervene in pension funds — forcing them to invest in private companies — will boost the amount of money being pumped into the economy, Technology Secretary Peter Kyle said.】

item.title: 特朗普的第 899 款 "报复性 "税收为何令投资者担忧？
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面国内政策立法中，有一项措施旨在惩罚那些实行政府认为不公平的税收政策的国家，这项措施在华尔街引起了轩然大波。【原文：A measure in President Donald Trump’s sweeping domestic policy legislation designed to penalize countries with tax policies the administration considers unfair is causing a stir on Wall Street.】

item.title: 资产管理公司道森在 12 亿美元交易中汇集私募基金股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，另类资产管理公司 Dawson Partners 捆绑出售了私人资本基金股权，作为 12 亿美元证券化的一部分。【原文：Alternative asset manager Dawson Partners bundled up and sold private capital fund stakes as part of a $1.2 billion securitization, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行称欧洲养老基金可能推动美元抛售狂潮
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）的策略师认为，欧洲养老基金已开始增加货币对冲，如果这一趋势持续下去，将导致大量美元抛售。【原文：European pension funds have started to increase currency hedging and a continuation of this trend would amount to considerable US dollar selling, according to BNP Paribas SA strategists.】

item.title: 企业内部人士利用反弹以美国大选以来最快速度抛售股票
item.description: 美国股市重回正轨，距离二月份的历史高点近在咫尺。然而，企业高管却以 11 月以来最快的速度抛售股票。【原文：The US stock market is back on track and within spitting distance of February’s all-time highs. Yet corporate executives are dumping shares at the fastest clip since November.】

item.title: 英国冻结 342 处与孟加拉国前部长有关的房产
item.description: 英国警方冻结了与孟加拉国前土地部长家族有关的价值约 1.85 亿英镑（约合 2.52 亿美元）的 342 处房产，继续打击前政府成员持有的资产。【原文：British police have frozen 342 properties worth around £185 million ($252 million) linked to the family of Bangladesh’s ex-land minister, pursuing a crackdown on assets held by members of the former government.】

item.title: 美国称华为 2025 年人工智能芯片产量不超过 20 万颗
item.description: 特朗普政府的一位高级官员预计，华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：A senior Trump administration official projected that Huawei Technologies Co.’s output of its Ascend AI chip will be at or below 200,000 for 2025, responding to US lawmakers’ concerns that China is gaining ground in production of advanced semiconductors.】

item.title: 铜矿冲突显示数十年之久的定价体系出现裂痕
item.description: 加拿大矿商泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）和日本住友金属矿业公司（Sumitomo Metal Mining Co.【原文：Canadian miner Teck Resources Ltd. and Japan’s Sumitomo Metal Mining Co. are locked in a commercial dispute over a major copper supply deal, exposing cracks in a decades-old pricing system as the market endures a severe shortage.】

item.title: 香蕉价格对通货膨胀的启示
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 陷入困境的私募股权投资获得直接贷款人的帮助
item.description: 在私募股权公司努力出售其拥有的公司并向投资者返还现金的同时，私人信贷领域的同行们也在提供特殊贷款，帮助他们渡过难关。【原文：As private equity firms struggle to sell the companies they own and return cash to investors, their counterparts in the world of private credit are offering special loans to tide them over.】

item.title: 卡尼认为美加贸易谈判取得进展
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，他希望尽快与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）达成一项商业和安全协议，但他压低了协议将在几天后的七国集团峰会前准备就绪的期望。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said he hopes to secure a commercial and security agreement soon with US President Donald Trump, though he tamped down expectations that a deal will be ready in time for the Group of Seven summit in a few days.】

item.title: 贝莱德打造人工智能分析师 "阿西莫夫 "扫描文件
item.description: 贝莱德公司正计划让人工智能在投资中发挥更大的作用。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is planning for artificial intelligence to have a much bigger role in investing.】

item.title: 七月最后期限临近，印美贸易谈判立场趋于强硬
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，印度和美国的贸易官员在一些关键问题上的立场更加强硬，因为他们要争取在美国更高的关税于7月生效之前达成一项临时协议。【原文：Trade officials from India and the US have hardened their stance on some key issues as they race to conclude an interim deal before higher US tariffs take effect in July, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普重提单边关税威胁后，S&P 500 指数暴跌
item.description: 周四，在华尔街涨势停滞之后，美国 500 指数连续第二个交易日扩大跌幅，交易员们对通胀再次降温的情况视而不见，对最新一轮的中美贸易谈判也反应平淡。【原文：The S&P 500 Index extended losses for a second-straight session Thursday after Wall Street’s rally stalled, with traders looking past another cooling inflation print and reacting little to the latest round of US-China trade talks.】
